text: Francisco Vidal Franco Cisneros (born 25 August 1987 in Autlán, Jalisco, México) is a Mexican footballer, who plays as defender for Deportivo Toluca. ==Club career== Franco was one of the many uprooted young players from Toluca's secondary squad Atlético Mexiquense by then coach Américo Gallego. He made his professional debut with Toluca during the Clausura 2007 season. ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:People from Autlán, Jalisco Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Mexican footballers Category:Deportivo Toluca F.C. players Category:La Piedad footballers Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Atlético Mexiquense footballers Category:Liga MX players
title: Francisco Vidal Franco
